description: Pre-Commit Hooks for gsnake-editor and Parent gSnake Project - Add pre-commit hooks to remaining repos following established patterns

userStories.title: Add format/lint scripts to gsnake-editor package.json
userStories.description: As a developer, I need format and lint scripts in gsnake-editor to support the pre-commit hook.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'format' script using Prettier to package.json
Add 'lint' script using ESLint to package.json
Install necessary devDependencies (prettier, eslint, eslint-plugin-svelte if needed)

userStories.title: Create pre-commit hook for gsnake-editor
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a pre-commit hook for gsnake-editor that runs format, lint, typecheck, and build without tests.
acceptanceCriteria: Hook runs formatter check (npm run format -- --check or similar)
Hook does NOT run npm test, vitest, or test commands
Hook exits with error code on any failure

userStories.title: Create hooks README for gsnake-editor
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want clear documentation in gsnake-editor explaining how to enable and verify hooks.
acceptanceCriteria: README includes verification step (git config --get core.hooksPath)
README includes disable step (git config --unset core.hooksPath)
README lists exact commands run by the pre-commit hook
README follows same format as existing submodule hook READMEs

userStories.title: Create pre-commit hook for parent gSnake project
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a pre-commit hook for the parent gSnake project that validates gsnake-core workspace only.
acceptanceCriteria: Hook does NOT run 'npm run test:e2e'
Hook does NOT recurse into submodules
Hook includes comments explaining it checks gsnake-core only and avoids tests

userStories.title: Create helper script to enable hooks in all repos
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a helper script that enables hooks in the parent repo and all initialized submodules with one command.
acceptanceCriteria: Script sets core.hooksPath in parent repo (.github/hooks)
Script iterates through initialized submodules using git submodule foreach or similar
Script checks if .github/hooks exists in each submodule before setting config
Script provides clear output showing which repos had hooks enabled

userStories.title: Update parent hooks README to document all features
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want the parent repo's hooks README to document the helper script, commands run, and usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Add section documenting './enable-all-hooks.sh' for one-command enablement
Document manual per-repo enablement as alternative
List which repos have hooks available (parent, gsnake-web, gsnake-levels, gsnake-specs, gsnake-editor)
Explain that submodule hooks are independent and can be enabled selectively
List exact commands run by parent repo's pre-commit hook
Explain hooks exclude tests and parent hook doesn't check submodules
Maintain existing structure and add new sections appropriately
